caption.p: Activity of superoxide dismutase (mean ± SD) in apterous females of M. persicae ( A) and R. padi ( B) after treatment with selected Asteraceae essential oils. Values marked by different letters are significantly different at p < 0.05 (Tukey’s test). Statistics for two-way ANOVA: ( A) treatment F 2,24 = 49.66, p < 0.001, time F 3,24 = 9.19, p < 0.001, treatment × time interaction F 6,24 = 6.92, p < 0.001; ( B) treatment F 2,24 = 38.57, p < 0.001, time F 3,24 = 14.27, p < 0.001, treatment × time interaction F 6,24 = 8.91, p < 0.001.
